item.description:
I think Howl at the Moon is a fitting place to spend a Halloween happy hour.

Join me there if you feel the same way.

Before you go to or come from home, the gym, work, dinner, or wherever, meet up with a few drinking buddies for a minute or two or three or four or more...however long you're able.

I'm getting there at 5 and will hang around until 7. So don't be shy, say hi or boo in this case.

If you decide to stick around or arrive after 7 you will be able to enjoy Howl's high-energy dueling pianos performance. I'm certain Thriller and Monster Mash are on the playlist. 

Check out the Howl Food Menu and Howl Drink Menu

Check out MBTA or Hop Stop to create your route by public transit. Aquarium (blue line), Haymarket (green & orange lines), State (orange & blue lines), Government Center (blue & green lines), and South Station (red line & commuter rail) subway stations are no more than a fifteen (15) minute walk away.

AS ALWAYS YOU MUST MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a gold tiara with colorful stones and star shapes
item.name: Trick or Treat Drinking at Howl at the Moon
